blogPost.excerpt: ProApp is a place to learn all things Design. It's your Digital Design College to learn various Design disciplines with bite-sized content on the go. We launched with 30+ courses - UI/UX design, HCI, Mobile & Web Design, Typography, Microcopy, & many more.
blogPost.body: ProApp is a place to learn all things Design. It's your Digital Design College to learn various Design disciplines with bite-sized content on the go. We launched with 30+ courses - UI/UX design, HCI, Mobile & Web Design, Typography, Microcopy, & many more.
blogPost.title: ProApp Learn Design - Learn the foundations of design principles
blogPost.author: Sandesh Subedi

localize.description: ProApp是一个学习设计的地方。它是你的数字设计学院，让你在旅途中学习各种设计学科与比特大小的内容。我们推出了30多门课程--UI/UX设计，人机交互，移动和网页设计，字体设计，微电影，以及更多。
ProApp是一個學習設計的地方。它是你的數字設計學院，讓你在旅途中學習各種設計學科與比特大小的內容。我們推出了30多門課程--UI/UX設計，人機交互，移動和網頁設計，字體設計，微電影，以及更多。

previous.excerpt: Smoothly prepared for Food Intolerance and Vegan Diets. Tasty and healthy smoothie recipes. It serves easy, gluten-free, lactose-free and nut-free recipes for users keen on their health.
previous.title: Smoothly - Food intolerance and vegan diet recipes

localize.description: 为食物不耐受和素食者准备的冰沙。美味和健康的冰沙食谱。它为热衷于健康的用户提供简单、无麸质、无乳糖和无坚果的食谱。
localize.tagline: 食物不耐受和素食食谱

localize.description: 爲食物不耐受和素食者準備的冰沙。美味和健康的冰沙食譜。它爲熱衷於健康的用戶提供簡單、無麩質、無乳糖和無堅果的食譜。
localize.tagline: 食物不耐受和素食食譜

next.excerpt: Pablito Planeta is a design astrologist. Let's travel through the pixel galaxy to take a look into your future as a creative every month. Vamos, cariño—the gradient cosmos is yours!
next.title: Pablito Planeta - Monthly designer horoscopes by Pablo Stanley

localize.description: Pablito Planeta是一位设计占星师。让我们在像素星系中旅行，每个月都来看看你作为一个创意人的未来。Vamos, cariño--渐变的宇宙是你的
localize.tagline: 巴勃罗-斯坦利的每月设计师运势

localize.description: Pablito Planeta是一位設計占星師。讓我們在像素星系中旅行，每個月都來看看你作爲一個創意人的未來。Vamos, cariño--漸變的宇宙是你的
localize.tagline: 巴勃羅-斯坦利的每月設計師運勢
